features.title: Features
contents: Soft, breathable fabric ideal for travel and adventure.
Large front pocket and adjustable hood.
Minimalist design pairs well with any style.

fabricAndCare.title: Fabric & Care
contents: Machine wash cold on a gentle cycle.
Tumble dry low or hang to dry.
Do not use fabric softeners or bleach.
Iron on a low setting if necessary.

shipping.title: Shipping
contents: Free standard shipping on all orders - no minimum spend required.
Expedited shipping available at an additional cost.
Package in biodegradable to reduce environmental impact.
